ruleset.name: Apex Code Style Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code style and formatting

rule.name: ListInitializationMustBeMultiLine
rule.message: List initialization with {0} or more items must be formatted with each item on its own line for better readability
rule.description: List initializations with a minimum number of items (configurable via minItems property) must be formatted with each item on its own line to improve readability and maintainability. Lists with fewer items may remain on a single line.

property.name: minItems
property.description: Minimum number of list items required for multi-line formatting
